HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Standardní poplatek činí 144 Kč při platbě na dobírku. Při úhradě platební kartou je poplatek za dodání snížen na 96 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Při nákupu nad 500 Kč, při bezhotovostní platbě předem - DODÁNÍ ZDARMA

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only specified delivery method is home delivery via GLS courier service. No other options like parcel shops, lockers, or in-store pickup are mentioned. The service is available only within the Czech Republic.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs 96 Kč when paying by card and 144 Kč for Cash on Delivery (COD). Free delivery is offered for orders over 500 Kč when paid in advance.
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe is 3-5 business days.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free shipping threshold is very low at 500 Kč, but it only applies to prepaid orders. There is no mention of express or weekend delivery.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a single, easy-to-find page. However, it is very limited, covering only one provider and one delivery method. It is unclear if these terms apply to all products, including large appliances, or only to spare parts and accessories, which seem to be the focus of this e-shop.
